bio: Would love to knit the patterns by the lovely Petiteknit! Just bought a set of yarns, started knitting but I'm so stuck at the back side of the sweater and need help.
I've done a dozen of knitting projects including socks and sweaters, but I need inspiration and knitting groups near me to get back to the fun of knitting again.
Happy to help others and would love to make new knitter friends! Also let me know if you'd like to have free yarns to play with. I have way to many!
